description:
The gang saves Parl, who offers to help them escape from Beazon, but she seems a bit too helpful...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elemental Gelade of Light and Darkness
Hikari to Yami no Erementar Gerad
Pierre de lumière et des ténèbres
แก่นศิลาแห่งความมืดและแสงสว่าง
光と闇の核石(エレメンタルジェレイド)
